name: My Daily Life
description:
Oops! I overslept!
I'm sure everyone has such a day.

This is a fun game that anyone can play that depicts your daily life.

Oversleep and run, make coffee, cook food.
Please experience your daily life with a game!

ーーーーー
EU / California users can opt-out under GRPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
